description_html: More than a table, a sculpture, a perfect union of beauty and harmonious proportions. The meeting of two volumes achieves a perfect balance of one over the other. Disassembling table with base in rigid polyurethane covered with the new metallic finishes (metal bronze, metal rusty, metal grey) : micronized metal powder mixed with resin and spread by hand. An exclusively made in Italy product that combines artisan skills whit high technological content, aesthetics with functionality for a perfect sartorial experience. Available in round or oval shape, in eight different dimensions. Reduced dimensions yet intact personality also for the Mini Clay version.
